Description: Papyrus; black outline vignettes; Hieroglyphic text: House of Life.
Curator's comments: Published: Derchain, P. Le papyrus Salt 825 (B.M. 10051) : rituel pour la conservation de la vie en Égypte (Brussels, 1965). Barguet, RdE 21, p. 10. Cabrol, Les voies processionnelles de Thebes, OLA 97 (2001), p. 686.
See J. Quack, 'Beitraege zu einigen religioesen und magischen Texte', in M. Collier and S. Snape (ed.), Ramesside Studies in Honour of K. A. Kitchen (Bolton 2011), 416 [on 7.8, 15.7 f].
Bibliographic references: Parkinson 1999 / Cracking Codes: The Rosetta Stone and Decipherment (12)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (57505) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/57505)
